client.java:15075: illegal start of expression

^
client.java:18605: ‘;’ expeceted
^
client.java:18606:’); expected
)^[/quote]

You declared your method inside another method.

item.title: D claw(spec help)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

public boolean Process() { if (IsAttackingNPC && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

item.title: D claw(spec help)
item.dc:creator: @11bravo 11bravo
item.description:
@11bravo wrote:

when i add d claw spec and compile i get thid error

client.java:1502 ‘;’ expected
Public Boolean Process() {
^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2009, 08:21:21 pm[/size][hr]heres code i used

Public Boolean Process() {
if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) ;
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}

Read full topic
